page.shortlink: ux viewbox builder viewbox properties portraitlayout
page.description: The layout to use when the device is in portrait orientation.

discussion.p: The *[ui:Portrait layout]* property defines what ViewBox layout to use when the user's device is in a portrait orientation. Use the [...] smart field button for the property to select the layout. The layouts are defined on the *[ui:Multiple Layouts]* tab of the ViewBox Builder.
This property is used in tandem with the [Landscape layout] property to automatically render the ViewBox using separate layouts for portrait and landscape orientations.
This property is only shown when [Auto-select on orientation change] is enabled.
